attributes.action: Require all businesses to give at least one genuine address on their literature
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Current legislation requires a geographic address without defining that clearly.  This has led to the use of mail-boxes and mail forwarding addresses so that businesses can evade their customers when things go wrong.

In addition any sales telephone lines should be recorded in a publically available reverse directory linked to this address. 

Where this is not done contracts should not be enforceable
